title: Controllables
description: Array of Managed Physical or Digital Process Control Mechanisms

domain.description: Organization's Domain Name as registered with pluggables - e.g. example.com

trackingKey.description: WHAT - UUID - Unique ID of controllable

controller.description: WHO - Registered Key (email) of Decision Maker

implementer.description: WHO - Registered Key  (email) of individual or system making the Request

state.description: Current State of the controllable from the global control status enumeration: NEW, SUBMITTED, RECALLED, PENDING, APPROVED, HOLD, REJECTED, REASSIGNED, FAULT, NO_RESPONSE

process.description: WHY - Change Request Process is from the change request Process enumeration that may have additional states defined by the organization but always includes: PLANNED, UNPLANNED, STANDARD, EMERGENCY.

whenUpdated.description: WHEN - Always contains the UTC value for date+time expressed as the number of milliseconds since 1 January, 1970 UTC

whoUpdated.description: WHO - What system or individual caused this update (email)

location.description: WHERE - Location WKB Well Known Binary Representation for Location provde supply as Geometry lat, lng. If locaiton is not critical, the default should be set to the organization's primary location.

subject.description: A brief description of the implementer's request

body.description: The body (more detailed description) of the request

comments.description: The authoratative array of communication related to the Change Request.

attachments.description: An Array of pointers to links, files, or other media supporting the request or decision.

location.description: location of indivual or system responsible when attachment was created the attachment - ideal for capturing images or other media on site

tracking.description: An Array of time/location objects that display movement over time of this controlled process.

datetime.description: time location was delivered into system

notifiables.description: An Array of individuals or systems who will be notified of state changes.

notifyKey.description: sender's notification address - email, text, etc.

notificationEvent.description: event type to notify this email

lifecycle.description: Authoratative history of changes over the lifetime of the controllable.

changerRole.description: Role of individual or system responsible for the change (Controller, Implementer)

changeDescription.description: Brief description (audit) of the data changes that took place

propertyBag.description: A dynamic Array of properties you can use to track datapoints that are important to your particular process.

name.description: identifies the name of the property

value.description: contains the value of the property

tagBag.description: A dynamic Array of tags to facilitate search and analytics.
